mapper.select: /* snippBoard.getDetail */ SELECT SB.UID AS BOARD_UID ,SB.BBS_UID ,SB.TITLE ,SB.CONTENT ,SB.DELETE_AT ,SB.FILE_UID ,SB.REG_UID ,SB.REG_DT ,SU_REG.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,SB.UPDT_UID ,SB.UPDT_DT ,SU_UPDT.USER_ID AS UPDT_ID FROM SNP_BOARD SB LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_REG ON SU_REG.UID = SB.REG_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_UPDT ON SU_UPDT.UID = SB.UPDT_UID WHERE SB.UID = #{uid}

/* snippBoard.getDetailOfBoard */ SELECT SBOARD.UID AS BOARD_UID ,SBBS.UID AS BBS_UID ,SBCCL.UID AS CL_UID ,SBOARD.TITLE ,SBOARD.CONTENT ,SBOARD.DELETE_AT ,SBOARD.USE_AT ,SBOARD.FILE_UID ,SBOARD.REG_UID ,SBOARD.REG_DT ,SU_REG.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,SU_REG.USER_NM AS REG_NM ,SBOARD.UPDT_UID ,SBOARD.UPDT_DT ,SU_UPDT.USER_ID AS UPDT_ID ,SU_UPDT.USER_NM AS UPDT_NM FROM SNP_BOARD SBOARD INNER JOIN SNP_BBS SBBS ON SBBS.UID = SBOARD.BBS_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_BBS_CL SBCCL ON SBCCL.UID = SBOARD.CL_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_REG ON SU_REG.UID = SBOARD.REG_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_UPDT ON SU_UPDT.UID = SBOARD.UPDT_UID WHERE SBOARD.UID = #{uid}
